alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Thayer; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 6:24PM CDT until June 30 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Jewell County in north central Kansas... Northeastern Smith County in north central Kansas... Southern Nuckolls County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Webster County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern Thayer County in south central Nebraska... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 623 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ruskin to near Guide Rock to 6 miles north of Lebanon, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Nora around 630 PM CDT. Ruskin around 635 PM CDT. Bostwick around 640 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Deshler, Superior, Webber, Burr Oak and Hardy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
